roleset.name: to soften, quiet

example.name: mute-v: transitive
example.text: But President Bush is expected [*-1] to veto the congressional legislation and that , along with the easy approval of the Pennsylvania measure , is likely [*]to mute the abortion-rights activists ' claims of momentum and underline the challenges faced [*] by this resurgent movement .
example.arg: the abortion-rights activists ' claims of momentum

example.name: muted-j
example.text: Also ... it 's remarkable how muted the Forum wingnuts are about all this .

roleset.note: MUTE-V NOTES: Frames file for 'mute' based on survey of sentences in the WSJ corpus; adjectival 'muted' based on BOLT-4,5. Member of VNcls remedy-45.7 (from mute.01-v)
MUTED-J NOTES: Automatically created by Julia as an alias file for unification. (from muted.01-j)
